thread.title: Matthew McConaughey Says Americans Should 'Embrace' Donald Trump as President

author: Just Jared
title: Matthew McConaughey Says Americans Should 'Embrace' Donald Trump as President
text:
Matthew McConaughey Says Americans Should 'Embrace' Donald Trump as President 
Matthew McConaughey had some interesting things to say about Donald Trump being in the White House. 
The 47-year-old actor was recently asked what he thought about the new President and if Americans need to accept him. 
“Well, they don’t have a choice now,” Matthew told ChannelFi . “He’s our president. And it’s very dynamic and as divisive of an inauguration and time as we’ve had. At the same time, it’s time for us to embrace and shake hands with this fact and be constructive with him over the next four years.” 
You can watch his interview below. 
WHAT DO YOU THINK about Matthew’s comments on Trump? Matthew McConaughey Talks About Donald Trump
